CustomField.description: Donor<Registered> Are in the system as a potential donor Donor<Verified> Has filled out basic profile information and have passed initial criteria Donor<Applicant> Has an appointment to assess their fitness for donation Donor<Eligible> Has met all criteria for donation and Eligiblity datetime is today or in the past Donor<Ineligible> Has met all critieria for donation and Eligibility datetime is in the future Donor<Excluded> Can never give plasma for various reasons that are PHI
CustomField.label: Status
